sentences.en: Ann's eyes followed a police car as it drove slowly past.
sentences.cn: 安注视着一辆缓缓驶过的警车。

sentences.en: As she went past there was a gust of strong perfume.
sentences.cn: 她走过时有一股浓烈的香水味。

sentences.en: Ben drove past them, nosing his car into the garage.
sentences.cn: 本小心翼翼地把车开进车库时从他们身边经过。

sentences.en: Come on Annie, it’s long past your bedtime.
sentences.cn: 快点，安妮，早就过了你的上床时间了。

sentences.en: From past experience she knew that it was no use arguing with him.
sentences.cn: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.en: Go north on I-15 to the exit just past Barstow.
sentences.cn: 沿着15号州际公路一直向北，一过巴斯托就从出口驶出。

sentences.en: He fell asleep just past midnight with tolerable ease.
sentences.cn: 他刚过午夜就睡着了，睡得还算安稳。

sentences.en: He had clung to the remembrance of things past.
sentences.cn: 他沉湎于过去的记忆。

sentences.en: I must have driven past that place thousands of times.
sentences.cn: 我得有上千次开车经过那里。

sentences.en: I should be finished by half past (= 30 minutes after the hour ) .
sentences.cn: 我应该可以在30分钟之后完成。

sentences.en: I wouldn't put it past him to slip something into the drinks.
sentences.cn: 我认为他有可能在这些饮料中偷偷加了什么东西。

sentences.en: In the past he dallied with actresses and lady novelists.
sentences.cn: 他过去曾与许多女演员和女小说家调情。

sentences.en: In the past this process of transition has often proven difficult.
sentences.cn: 过去这一过渡过程常常很艰难。

sentences.en: It was past midnight when the party ended.
sentences.cn: 派对结束的时候已经过了午夜。

sentences.en: It's half past two. I think we had better go home.
sentences.cn: 现在两点半了。我想我们最好还是回家吧。

sentences.en: It’s ten past nine.
sentences.cn: 现在是九点十分。

sentences.en: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.cn: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

sentences.en: Judging by her past performance, Jane should do very well.
sentences.cn: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.en: She accuses me of having blocked out the past.
sentences.cn: 她指责我把过去忘得一干二净。

sentences.en: She waved as she drove past.
sentences.cn: 她开车经过的时候挥了挥手。

sentences.en: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.cn: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.en: The past has been scarred by countless perversions of justice.
sentences.cn: 无数的是非颠倒使过去的岁月伤痕累累。

sentences.en: The situation is long past the stage when anyone's advice would help.
sentences.cn: 情况早变了，不是谁提个建议就能补救的事儿。

sentences.en: When Myra told Karp she'd expose his past, he blew up.
sentences.cn: 当迈拉告诉卡普她会把他的过去全抖搂出去时，卡普大为光火。

sentences.en: Whoops, it's past 11, I'd better be off home.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，11点多了，我最好还是回家吧。

sentences.en: Will you be going past my house on your way home?
sentences.cn: 你回家的路上会经过我家吗？

sentences.en: You mustn’t think about it. It’s all in the past now.
sentences.cn: 你千万不要再想那件事，现在一切都过去了。

phrases.tran_cn: ◎照老皇历办事，按旧章程办事；因循守旧
认为某人有可能会做（错事，轻率的事）
过去（的经历）；[医]既往病史，过去病史
(非正式)（因年老）变得没用的，做不好任何事的
n. 老手；对某种技艺有丰富经验者

trans.tran_cn: 过去的，以前的，结束的，前任的
trans.tran_en: done, used, or experienced before now
up to and beyond a person or place, without stopping

trans.tran_cn: 过去，过往，往事，[语]过去时
trans.tran_en: used to say that an unpleasant experience has ended and can be forgotten
